screens.description: This screen is to show the user that is exceeding the monthly amount for that budget.
screens.name: Amount_Higher_Warning_Message
screens.label: Amount Higher Warning Message

fields.name: Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
YOU ARE EXCEEDING THE MONTHLY AMOUNT FOR THIS BUDGET


Month available amount: ${!Get_Budget_Record.Available_Amount__c}.


If you agree with this, please click on "Create Expense".


NOTE: If you click "Create Expense" take into account that this expense will go to the "Pending Approval" stage.

screens.description: This screen is to show the user that is exceeding the monthly amount for that budget.
screens.name: Amount_Higher_Warning_Message_for_Multiple_Team_Members
screens.label: Amount Higher Warning Message for Multiple Team Members

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Error_Message
fields.fieldText:
YOU ARE EXCEEDING THE MONTHLY AMOUNT FOR THIS BUDGET


Month available amount: ${!Get_Budget_Record_for_Multiple_Team_Members_Opt.Available_Amount__c}.


If you agree with this, please click on "Create Expense".


NOTE: If you click "Create Expense" take into account that this expense will go to the "Pending Approval" stage.

fields.name: Warning_Message_for_Annual_Budget
fields.fieldText: The annual budget needs to be approved before creating an expense.

fields.name: Success_Message_Multiple_Records
fields.fieldText: All records were created successfully!

fields.fieldText: The record was created successfully!
